taskbody.prereq: You must have a github account to connect to the repository. If not, please contact your system administrator.
taskbody.context: You are about to import a whole project from a central repository.

step.stepresult: The Select import source dialog is displayed.

step.cmd:
Choose
Git Projects from git
and click Next.
step.stepresult: Select repository Source dialog box is opened.

step.cmd: Select URI icon and click Next .
step.stepresult: The Source Git Repository dialog is displayed.

step.cmd: In the URI field, copy/paste the following address: https://github.com/temenostech/Hothouse.git and hit Tab key.
Enter your github credentials in the User and Password fields and click Next .
step.stepresult: The Branch Selection dialog is displayed.

step.cmd: Keep all branches selected and click Next
step.stepresult: The local destination dialog is displayed.

step.cmd: Click on Browse to select a folder for the local storage of your project. For example: C:\gitHub\Hothouse . Keep the master in the Initial Branch and origin for the remote name. Click Next
step.stepresult: The Select a wizard to use for importing projects dialog is displayed. please wait for the system to load projects.

step.cmd: Keep the Import existing projects selected and click Next
step.stepresult: The Import projects dialog is displayed listing all available projects.

step.cmd: Deselect All projects. Select project you need and click Finish .

taskbody.result: Latest revision of selected projects are added to your workspace. You ready to start working in a collaborative mode.
